mathale wijaya widyalaya aadi shishya sangamaya warshikawa sanwidhanaya karana 12 wani nijabima satana samastha lanka sath samajika hoki tharagawaliye pirimi surathawaya shri lanka guwan hamuda krida samaja pila wisinda, kantha surathawaya shri lanka nawika hamuda krida samaja pila wisinda, himi kara gathha.mema tharagawaliyata samagamiwa pawathi samastha lanka wiwrutha awurudu 40 n ihala pirimi tharagawaliye surathawaya mathale park krida samajayatada madhyama palath saha oolkat pasal athara pawathi aaradhitha wayasa awurudu 14 n pahala balaka tharagawaliye surathawaya mathale sahira jathika pasalatada himi wiya.dayalog samagame anugrahaya yatathe pawathi mema tharagawaliya nandimithra eekanayaka anthar jathika kruthrima hoki kridanganaya kendra kara ganimin pasugiyada mathale di pawathwina.pirimi kandayam 22 k, kantha kandayam 8 k, balaka kandayam 12 k saha wayasa awurudu 40 n ihala pirimi kandayam 5 ka sahabhagithwayen pawathi mema tharagawaliye di winithama kandayamata himi wishesha sammanaya dina ganimata migamuwa maristela widuhal krida samaja pila samath wiya.
